review: I was so impatient to carry out necessary research but I really wanted to jump on the crypto trading and investment buzz. Unfortunately for me, I invested 90,700 USD worth of bitcoin with a fraudulent company. I was happy to watch my account grow to 240,575 USD within a couple of weeks. But I didn't realize I was dealing with a scam company, until I tried to make an attempt to withdraw. I made a withdrawal request, and noticed my account was suddenly blocked for no apparent reason. I tried contacting customer support, but all to no avail. I needed my money back at all cost, because I could not afford to let it go. So I tried all possible means to make sure I recovered my scammed bitcoin. I did a lot of online search for help, and tried to see if there were other people who had any similar experience. I stumbled upon a cryptocurrency forum were a couple of people mentioned that they had been through the same process but were able to recover their lost cryptocurrency, funds with the help of Matthew at RecoveryBureauc At gmailcom. So I file a report and he was able to help me get back all my lost funds within few hours, I feel indebted to him. Apart from trying to express my gratitude to them once again using this medium, I will recommend anybody who wants to recover scammed bitcoin, stolen cryptocurrency, funds lost to binary options forex, investment and any other form of online scam, reach out to Matthew on RecoveryBureauc via gmail and thank me later
title: Best Review

A week ago tried to buy and pop up said buying has been suspended- again no explanation. Many support tickets later during which I have been told an ‚Äòexpert‚Äô is reviewing my account, I received email telling me my account restrictions can‚Äôt be reviewed until after 29 day and cannot elaborate. They are basically HOLDING MY FUNDS HOSTAGE!! I don‚Äôt want to sell because if value goes up I will lose money.  Am looking for organisation to complain about CB. title: When price drops

review:
So I‚Äôm going to be honest I was abit skeptical about the crypto-market at first but since getting coinbase I‚Äôve learned only learned abit, that‚Äôs it lol. I started off well deposit ¬£3 n managed to increase my portfolio but only because of the earning ability in this app, only $30 worth. This is app is too basic for you to fully learn about cryptocurrencies/tokens, buying & selling. Also there are too many hidden fees weather your buying or selling, even converting one crypto to another, it‚Äôll slowly eat away at your profits. The only way I‚Äôve managed to stop/prevent any further losses from occurring is by depositing all my cryptos to coinbasePro; which if I‚Äôm being honest is total B.S, the fact that another app is cheaper than the original one is massive red flag. Also connection is slow, the amount of times I get stuck on the troubleshooting page whilst trying to load into the app was worrying, kept thinking I was being hacked. 

Final thoughts - Okay app to start off your crypto journey; if you have the money for it. But not a long-term solution if you want to get fully into crypto investments & profit off it.
title: Honest Review

review: I started using bitcoin about a week ago I put some money in using my debit card and that went fine but the problem started when I tried to add a bank account so I could get lower fees and I could transfer more money as for a debit card it would only let me do ¬£300 per week. I have now had a response from Coinbase saying that I cannot add a bank account because of my location in this case in the UK so the only way I can sell the crypto currency is to do it through PayPal which I do not have. I just wish the app when trying to add a bank account with already knowing where you are in the world would just come up with a caption saying you cannot add a bank account with you being in the UK. I don‚Äôt understand why Coinbase won‚Äôt allow you to add a bank account as you have to verify your bank account by transferring some small funds into it I would think that a debit or credit card would be more of a dodgy transaction as they can be stolen and used very easily. Looks like I‚Äôll have to go through the rigmarole of opening a PayPal account to get my money out.
title: Easy app to use but does have some underlying difficulties if you are in the UK

review:
I am new to trading. I started with reading a few books and then did research on easy to use apps. I‚Äôm a single mum who had to cancel Netflix to have a little money each month to invest. I started with just the ¬£10 I would of spent on Netflix and bought Bitcoin at -4.5. It‚Äôs now worth over ¬£12 in less than two months. I‚Äôm learning so much and actually looking forward to the anticipated crash! I‚Äôll be the first in my family to do what the rich do and hand my children a portfolio of valuable stocks while we benefit from the profit while I'm still here. Coinbase also have a ‚Äòcoinbase wallet‚Äô which I‚Äôm learning about now as it gives access to stocks not available on this app. I highly recommend you do some research and get onboard. 
M
title: Highly recommend

review: I did everything to follow the process, answered questions, verified my mobile and email, and submitted a photo of my drivers licence. I then got an email saying I was good to go and start investing. I invested money in Bitcoin. Shortly after I get an email saying that my account is under review (not specifying why it‚Äôs under review). I am not unable to sell the Bitcoin that I invested in or buy more. What if Bitcoin crashes - and I‚Äôm unable to sell? I‚Äôve tried to contact customer support and all I get is a robot not answering the question. I then raised a ticket, again not answering the questions on why I‚Äôm under review and is an automated response! I am getting no where and not liking the fact that you have technically frozen my ability to sell my investment or have control over my account. This is a joke! If you are going to put accounts under review you should at least explain why to allow the customer to put it right - also this should be before I am able to invest money, not after! You should also give the customer the option of speaking with a customer services rep to sort the problem out not just send robotic responses out!
title: Invested money in Bitcoin and then they put my account under review

review:
I downloaded the Coinbase app around a week ago without checking the reviews or knowing much about crypto coin investing/trading but wanted to get in on the hype. 

The app is very easy to use and the fee‚Äôs seem ok only because I haven‚Äôt used other exchanges/wallets to compare. I know some UK banks don‚Äôt allow crypto withdrawals but mine does and in less than a week I have traded making decent profit. 

The fee‚Äôs are taken when selling to your FIAT wallet and not on converting or withdrawing to your verified bank account which needs a ¬£2 deposit to set up. I have stayed well away from using paypal at all costs but have deposited into coinbase from my credit card and bank account. 

All the problems seem to be around bitcoin which I bought to hold but all the rest of the alt coins have been fine when buying and selling especially during highs or lows. 

My mobile Coinbase app works great with Koinly which is a tax software to help keep track of wallet transactions that I need for the HMRC. I needed the software quickly when I realised I was trading much more than just an investment for the long term. Plus the tax on crypto profit isn‚Äôt that simple to track if you trade a lot. 

This app has been great so far but do your own due diligence. I hope this helps.
title: UK user feedback

review: After reading everyone‚Äôs negative reviews iv decided to write one myself, for me the app has been a very positive experience, I found it was really easy to set up and easy to verify my identity it was also very straight forward to add a credit card and as for doing a sepa  international transfer I found it very easy indeed, just male sure you imput Coinbase‚Äôs bank details with your unique reference correctly. I bank with Barclays and my sepa transfer was FREE and it arrived and was confirmed early the very next working day! As for withdrawing I haven‚Äôt yet done that but can see my bank details already saved waiting for me to click, Barclays charge ¬£6 to receive a sepa payment so again great value for money really! The only reason I haven‚Äôt gave the app 5 stars is the fact it is slightly glitchy at busy times but their engineering site is very informative about any current issues and they are working at upgrading their infrastructure all the time so overall so far so good üëçüèº

review:
I am not one for writing reviews but I feel very strongly about this and hope whoever reads my review will take heed and look elsewhere. 
It seems that no matter how many hoops you jump through (verifications) for Coinbase, they restrict your ability to buy, sell or transfer crypto as they please for no valid reason. 
I joined Coinbase today and did all that was required of me to be verified (to the top level) to now be in a position where I have a considerable amount of BTC on their platform and have no access to it. Makes me wonder after reading similar stories if this is how Coinbase makes money. Take our funds and keep them for a while and then give us back after making some money. 
So anyway, like everyone else I‚Äôm awaiting a response from Customer Services, we‚Äôll see how that goes. 
Funny thing is I read all the negative reviews but because I saw a few positive ones I thought I‚Äôd try Coinbase. Don‚Äôt get get caught out like I did. Go elsewhere. 
If Coinbase sort me out then I‚Äôll give credit where credit is due, and if not then I‚Äôll be back in here to report likewise.

*** Update***
What looks like a generic email was received on Sunday 23 August 2020 at 04:06 am. The email states that my case has been sent to a specialist and I should get a response in 5-7 business days or maybe longer. 
So a good amount of BTC is sat on coinbase platform and I am having to wait even though as I said before I‚Äôve done everything asked of me.
title: Please consider all the negative reviews

review:
You can‚Äôt make money from trading via coinbase unless the fluctuation of your crypto has increased by atleast 10 percent. If your like me and trying to profit between 2-10 percent per conversion instead of withdrawing your money to avoid fees, Coinbase will almost certainly convert your currency at a loss of even though they say no fee. They justify this buy saying there is a 200 basis point to account for the offer they honour you which basically means you will be paying 2% to them every time u exchange at the least and further more you can receive even less that they claim accounts for slippage.

I checked my value at the time of my transactions and even if I have been successful by the time my selected crypto has increased by ten percent I just start to break even. 

In my opinion this is a total abuse of my good faith as a customer and would only recommend storing on coinbase and maybe long term trading.
title: It‚Äôs bad for everyday trading but ok for storing I guess

review:
I recently got a new phone and had issues logging in as I wasn‚Äôt receiving the text messages containing the codes I needed. I called Coinbase and they were very helpful in talking me through steps to check the settings on my phone and what we could do to resolve it, although I still didn‚Äôt get the texts at the time. I eventually got into my account by using a different number and received an email to confirm all was ok and as I left a bad review on here they reached out to me too in order to look into the matter. 
Today I received all the texts out of the blue and some others so it wasn‚Äôt the fault of Coinbase but I am very assured by their service and how they followed up to ensure I was happy.
title: Very good service

review:
Based in London and buy in GBP. Pretty steep FX which I understand (as all scaleups trying to turn profitable not just revenue generator ) BUT they don‚Äôt seem to know where their positioning; trading (ie Robinhoods of this world) vs investing (AJBell et all), as they like to appear as the latter but are really much more of the former. 

Evidence? Well, what is the point of showing portfolio today without allowing you to see option of what it was when you bought, either in USD or GBP terms? Well because they want you to
day trade and not think longe term. That‚Äôs one of many (eg chart detailing) small features the head of product has been tasked with to focus on growth / immediate traction as opposed to loyalty. Started here and like it, but unless it cater to more serious traders with more than pocket change to play with, will move elsewhere.

review:
Coinbase‚Äôs customer service is non existent, I‚Äôve known people to wait 2+ months to get a reply and most of the time the issue isn‚Äôt resolved 

What‚Äôs worse is that they are fine with letting you deposit money in and using it to buy crypto but once you have money in you can‚Äôt take it out so your money could be losing it‚Äôs value while they block you from taking it out, in my case I‚Äôve doubled my money and I‚Äôm left sitting here watching it all disappear as coinbase do nothing 

I‚Äôve been waiting for weeks now just to get my support request seen to and still nothing, they say that it takes 1 - 4 days to verify a bank account so that I can move money that you have sold back into your account but it‚Äôs been over 3 weeks for me now and still nothing, coming up on a month 

Everything above could be excused if they actually communicated to you about what the problem is but instead you‚Äôre left sitting there for weeks or in most cases even months thinking if you have lost all your money, it might even be illegal as they never stated that you cannot take your money out once it‚Äôs deposited

Even their fees are ridiculous and what are we even paying them for??? A service which we are not even getting... I‚Äôm moving to a different crypto service because at this point anything is better than coinbase, binance here I come
title: Run away while you still can!

title: WARNING!! Do not use coinbase!!

review:
I downloaded both Coinbase and Coinbase Pro a week ago, and signed up for a Coinbase account.  I answered all of the questions, and submitted my UK driving licence - yet my account is STILL under review.  My partner signed up a couple of days after me, and was verified relatively quickly.  Why did the same not happen for me?  How long am I supposed to carry on waiting?!? 

I contacted Coinbase support, and their email response said that my account was ‚Äústill under review‚Äù and that ‚Äúdue to a high number of requests, account reviews are taking longer than usual but our team is working hard to get to yours.‚Äù  What a joke.

Out of frustration of not being able to trade on Coinbase, I have signed up to Binance.  They verified me within a couple of hours - no problems whatsoever.  I am extremely disappointed by the poor customer service offered by Coinbase, not to mention the complete waste of my time.  Utter rubbish.
title: New account still under review

review:
I transferred Ethereum from my MetaMask wallet to the coinbase wallet address that was shown when I clicked ‚Äúreceive‚Äù on my coinbase app‚Ä¶ as soon as I done this, the transaction was completed on the metamask end, but never showed up in my coinbase account‚Ä¶ 
Contacted ‚Äúsupport‚Äù, spoke to multiple agents and none of them could answer any of my questions as to where my funds were sitting as the transaction had completed. They proceeded to tell me my funds were unretrievable because I apparently sent ethereum to the wallet address of a different type of crypto?! How?! I legitimately only pressed the receive button on the app, as any customer would, and their lack of due diligence to alert customers on the ‚Äúreceive‚Äù page that this can happen is disgraceful. I dread to imagine how many people have been scammed this way? I lost a merely ¬£154 but I needed that money for bills, I feel worse for people who have lost more.
title: Disgraceful customer service and scammers

review:
I‚Äôve liked coinbase since I first signed up, it‚Äôs an app on my iPhone, not sure if I get all the functionality coinbase has to offer, but the ease of buys and sells is fantastic, and I‚Äôve noticed fees have become cheaper making regular moving easer and safer.
I would like to see, and very soon a far wider range of crypto assets available on here, as it takes too long  and can easily miss a window buying a good new coin (like tron maybe) xrp definitely!! 
Also I would like more updates regarding bitcoincash sv, what‚Äôs going on etc, why can I not yet get my coins out of sv? 
Better charts would be fantastic and more news feeds too. Ultimately I love the site, I signed up to LBX (as I‚Äôm English) and they offered xrp, what a nightmare of a palaver that sight is, so I‚Äôve abandoned it to focus here on coinbase.
title: My views on coinbase

review: It would appear you need to be a border collie or another intelligent hardworking breed to withdraw any money made or in accounts from this company as you have to jump through enough hoops even a crufts winner would struggle with, first of all you think it‚Äôs a trustworthy app that you can deposit money easily with and get started which is true, but god forbid you want to get any of your money back, you have to create another account because a debit/credit card just won‚Äôt do (although you can use one to deposit money, funny that!) then you have to create an online account which kindly gives you a GBP or EUR wallet (thanks for nothing) then you have to do the most long winded transfer of ‚Ç¨1 Euro to a bank in Czech Republic which my bank charges you ¬£9 for the privilege, to be told that you must wait 2-3 working days, so out of the ¬£26 I had in my wallet I will probably just about get half of that. So in short... DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP OR GIVE IT YOUR MONEY
title: Need to be a border collie to get your money

review: Coinbase has quickly went from a 5 star app to 1.  The company appear to suffer from a serious issue when it comes to ID verification - I have been using the app for several months happily, having originally verified ID. Out of the blue I was asked to verify my ID again; it‚Äôs worth noting up to this point I had only bought crypto and not engaged in selling, withdrawals or sending funds. Unfortunately at this junction Coinbase has failed to verify the same ID as it does not match DOB given on account - this is not the case. Many attempts later using different upload methods and forms of ID, my identity is still not verified.  Contacted customer services by email and originally received a canned response, my follow up has remained unanswered for several weeks now.  I now have a restricted account with a considerable amount of money being held hostage.  Coinbase sort this out or I will escalate the matter to the financial services ombudsman.
title: Avoid! Holding my money hostage and no response

review:
Almost 4 weeks passed and still unable to use the app despite submitting verification correctly. Raised a ticket online through their site, few days later was told they are investigating, a week or so passed and I chased them up, again told they are still investigating, week later I get a notification via email informing me the issue had been resolved and the ticket closed‚Ä¶checked the app and surprise surprise problem still existed. Raised another ticket and still waiting  for it to be resolved, no response or update from them, but I‚Äôm getting several news emails and notifications informing what I could be doing with Coinbase (annoying)
No other means of contacting Coinbase but via email. Now Coinbase have my personal data and I can‚Äôt even use the service.
Think twice about registering for this app, currently using Kraken and experienced none of these issues.
title: Poor service, don‚Äôt waste your time

review:
A really good app, incredibly easy to use and set up bank details, withdrawals, trades etc. The app is also improving constantly which is great though the fees for any transaction are a little high

Only issue is with notifications - I don‚Äôt understand why these were edited, I used to be able to set a notification to say when a certain coin was above/below an amount, at which I would be happy to buy/sell. These have been removed and replaced with generic daily notifications that ‚Äúx has gained y% in 24 hours‚Äù at which point it‚Äôs too late or not relevant. This makes things much more difficult to keep an eye on without looking at the app all day. Would love to see this back in the next update
title: Easy to use and improving app

review:
First off you think this is a good company to buy cryptocurancy, but , wait for it, once you want to try and withdraw funds, yep you guessed it, it's almost impossible. With only an automated computer system taking you round in circles till your blue in the face. 

There is no U.K. Based help line , there is a help line available but this is based in America to be precise.......California.

 Don't take my word for it read reviews about this company. 
If your in the U.K., it's like trying to get blood out of a stone. Emailed them over a week ago and still no  response. 

It states on their customer support page, only accepting problems with log in and deposits..... mmmmm that's appropriate isn't it? 
Yep so if you want to withdraw funds, yep no support assistance , so basically your money is stick in crypto land. This is a big problem for people based on the U.K. 

Tones of people the same as my self in the same situation. 

Just to add I was able to deposit funds via my bank (HSBC ) 
I got my bank to send money via the SEPTA verification, to validate my account. 
I sent them copy's of my passport and driving licence. 
Bought close to ¬£4000 of cryptocurrency . 
Met all the regulations, but unable to withdraw funds. 

I am not alone. 
Please , be aware, as when you want you funds out, your guess is as good as mine as to when I'll be able if ever to get them back using " COINBASE ".
title: URGENT , READ THIS

review:
I have invested some money on coinbase. It was all very easy to deposit money into coinbase but withdrawing it so far I am finding impossible.
They asked to verify my account which I did by sending a small amount of money to coinbase and they confirmed the receipt of the money. Still unable to withdraw the money. It still ask me to verify the account which I am have already done. 
I tried to get help from their online chat but frustratingly it‚Äôs all automated chat and won‚Äôt be able to answer queries.
I will stay away from coinbase to be honest. I WILL get my money back though even if it means getting legal help. Won‚Äôt let these dodgy companies play with others money. Very very unhappy and unsatisfied. Actually I am more angry towards myself for jumping into using coinbase. At least my reviews may help others.
I am happy to change my opinions if coinbase calls me and helps me with my situation but until then I have no faith.
title: Very frustrating and untrustworthy

review:
I‚Äôve been using the app for around a month now. It would be all good if it wasn‚Äôt for 2 things that put me off quite a bit. 
1. When I did purchase some cryptocurrency the purchase actually went through at higher price than the current value of the currency, which at that moment was actually going down as well... Why? I would like to know too. Not cool Coinbase.
2. I did complete the tasks to receive free rewards, which never materialised. When I emailed the support asking what could be causing this and how can they assist to resolve it, it took over a week to get a response. They did resolve the issue, but the response was lacklustre. No standard apologies for the issues, nothing of the sort, just dry and short, we resolved issue. I left me feeling discouraged from engaging with the app further and especially from putting my own money into in.
title: So far not impressed

review: Signed up about a month ago, went through all the verification checks on the app no problem, thought ready to go but when trying to trade it said They needed to verify account, usually takes about two days. A week and a half went by, still wouldn‚Äôt let me use and had the same message, so I contacted support. I received an email saying looking into it. Several days later I received another email saying it‚Äôs been resolved. Tried again, still saying waiting verification, so contacted support again who said not to email them with multiple requests. I wouldn‚Äôt have if they hadn‚Äôt sent me an email saying it had been resolved when it hadn‚Äôt! Just received another email from support saying it has been resolved, guess what, still says waiting verification when I go in!! Absolute joke, if I could give it zero stars I would
title: Terrible, can‚Äôt even get started!

review: UPDATED:CB is now accepting my Bank Wire again, so have upped the star ranking to 3 from two. Two losses are for a boring app, we need more stat & data & why not expand the news section to include video from MSM and crypto currency influencers? Secondly the fees are two high. Functionality however is very good.  [Old review:CB was working brilliantly until the beginning of June. I‚Äôd already made some purchases with a bank wire and then all of a sudden they stopped accepting my GDP deposits, and returning them after a few days minus one pound. This made me miss the bitcoin lows at that time. This was beyond frustrating, now they are accepting another payment method but this has weekly limit. Currently looking for a more reliable and stable platform to do my crypto business with. Shame]
title: What‚Äôs going on?

review:
Coinbase

To whoever reads this from Coinbase,

As a customer I am absolutely appalled by your lack of support and honesty towards your customers. I cannot afford to have large sums of money to be robbed from me by you fraudster and I‚Äôm in the process of seeking advice on how to take further action against Coinbase. If you say you‚Äôre not a fraudulent service as you appear to be then kindly respond to your customers my allowing them to get their money back!

If you value your hard earned money, please stay away!!! I too read the negative reviews but brushed them aside which I regret right now. Please stay away!! And Apple should really ban this app to protect its customers from fraud. This app is a scam and should not be available from the App Store!!
title: Fraudulent - stay away!!

review: Lots of bad reviews so was very skeptical to use but decided to go by friends advice and set up I followed instructions and account was set up in 15 minutes no pending done my first trade from Binance as my crypto is not supported by Coinbase which hopefully they will soon (Avax) had no problems at all little expensive swapping USDT to GBP 26 pounds on a 2500 dollar trade. Anyway all went through in mins 10 tops money in my account no problems whatsoever only bug bear Coinbase doesn‚Äôt support loads of crypto and fees to transfer a little expensive but still no issues whatsoever 10/10 will defo use again when I sell the bulk of my coins
title: Excellent

review: It was so easy to make a deposit into the wallets in order to buy the cryptocurrencies but withdrawing wasn't. They make you transfer an international payment in order to "verify" your bank account. When you buy the currencies they up the price more than what shows on the app. They take their own cut when you sell it off. Then even after paying a fee for verification, they take your own money to handle the fee they should be paying to transfer to your account when you withdraw. I am absolutely appalled by these theives with the hidden fees that they do not clearly mention prior to depositing into the wallets. The only reason this app is highly rated is due to the people spamming their codes for $10 off. The customer service does not exist, they will never respond to you. To be honest this whole trading system should be reported as stealing. Never again shall I trust such apps and neither should you. STAY AWAY.
title: Scammers

review: Happy to amend this review if I am proven wrong, however right now I am very concerned about Coinbase. It‚Äôs oh so easy to put money into it via debit or credit card but nigh on impossible to get it out. They say that you need to make a debit to their account (in Estonia) to set up a banking relationship ahead of taking money out (as opposed to letting you withdraw to the same card account that you made the deposit with which most e-wallets do). Says that his will show up within 1-2 days. Well, I made that deposit 7 working days ago and it hasn‚Äôt showed up yet. It also fails to recognise IBAN and SWIFT/BIC account numbers that reputable banks like HSBC UK provide. If you like seeing a nice pretty graph with your investment going up then this is the app for you. If you want to get into a catch-22 cycle with only a Bot to respond to your questions when they fail to let you get any of your money out then this is the app for you!
title: Coinbase needs to up its game

review:
Everything was fine and worked fine for a long while then one day while making a payment it was buffering and taking ages it got refused , so I tried again the same happened and my card got blocked . I spoke to customer service at CB and they told me my bank had declined the transaction and to take it up with them which I did, they told me that the transaction hadn‚Äôt even come through that there was nothing showing on there end to refuse ! I spoke to CB again at which point they told me my bank doesn‚Äôt deal them anymore.. Which I found out is untrue on a customer base there is nothing stopping me purchasing from them. The people I dealt with were unprofessional, googling things and didn‚Äôt sound like they were in a professional setting.

I don‚Äôt see the point of these reviews and comments from the developer then nothing ever gets done!
title: Unprofessional

review: I deposited a thousand pounds in Coinbase to start crypto investing and it was going fairly well for a few weeks. But then the crypto market started to perform badly and I wanted to sell my investments. I was not able to sell anything. When trying to sell anything I got the message ‚Äúaccount is not able to sell‚Äù. My account is fully verified and the security settings say I am authorised to sell unlimited amount but still I CANNOT ACTUALLY SELL ANYTHING! I am based in the UK and my friends are able to sell their crypto with no problem so there is no issue with the location. This doesn‚Äôt make sense! I have tried to contact Coinbase support many times to find out what‚Äôs going on but I HAVE NEVER RECEIVED ANY RESPONSE!!! They are thieves who have stolen my money and I have seen other similar reports of this online. The customer support is non existent and I have no way to reclaim my money. DO NOT RISK THIS HAPPENING TO YOU!!
title: All my money is trapped in Coinbase

review:
This app is verging on criminal. They will take your money in seconds however withdrawing that money is beyond complicated. You are forced to jump through hoops and charged commission and fees at every stage. Whatever small profit you may have made is instantly wiped out in fees. I lost a good amount of money. What I have left in my account I cannot withdraw because they make it so hard for you. How Apple have allowed this app to remain on the App Store after continued reviews calling it a scam is beyond negligent. 

Try contacting the customer services-if they ever reply  they give you some random answer to a question you never asked. If they finally address your concern they make it so unbelievably complicated that you invariably give up. An absolute joke of an app and criminal organisation. Avoid. 

This scam will loose you everything you put into it and more. Do not download you will loose everything you put in.
title: Do not download this app

review: I have been waiting over 2 months for my account to be verified. Within 24 hours they verified me ONLY to allow me to purchase. Then as I wanted to trade and sell it kept saying account not verified. I have submitted so many requests for it to be dealt with and received nothing but an automated email stating that they are trying to deal with the issue. After that I receive an email to say my query has been dealt with and closed but NOTHING has changed. Awful app and awful customer service, beware people before you use this app. Worst customer service ever, I have made a complaint and waiting for a reply from that, if not resolved I will take it to the financial ombudsman to be dealt with. I feel like I have been robbed, I put quite a lot of money initially and now it‚Äôs stuck in their app not allowing me to do anything with my own money. BEWARE PEOPLE
title: Worst App

review:
I downloaded this app about 2 months ago after submitting proof of id it work on pc or laptop not on my iphone. I send  message on there page and received response after 2 weeks they are looking in to it. Then i have waited 1 week and send another message received reply problem is solved. I checked app still not working. I sent them message again they have asked about some more details of problem i provided them iphone model and ios version app version etc . I received reply after few days problem is solved. I tried app it still not work same error message when open app show we are aware of this problem and trying to fix it. Do not worry your funds are safe. 
It is unexceptionable customer service from this well known app. I have given up and delete this app.
title: Mobile App not working rubbish customer service

review:
For argument‚Äôs sake, let‚Äôs say my balance is $1,000 USD. If I change this to GBP my balance says ¬£1,000. If I change it to EUR my balance still says ‚Ç¨1,000. This is really frustrating because I don‚Äôt know what my actual balance is‚Ä¶

The help page is really poor. You can only select your issue from a list of drop downs but none of them apply to the above, so how can I report the problem? The option for ‚Äòother‚Äô then forces me to pick the issue of accessing a deceased person‚Äôs account, which clearly isn‚Äôt correct. Why can‚Äôt there be a generic ‚Äòother‚Äô problem? Or even an email address for me to contact them?

Those issues aside, I find the interface much easier to use than other crypto apps which have too much information on screen.
title: Currency conversion not working. Poor help page.

review:
I had been thinking about buying some crypto for a while now and decided on Coinbase as a lot of reviews had said how easy it was to use. 
It‚Äôs really straight forward to set up and start buying crypto. I haven‚Äôt cashed out yet but that looks easy as well. 
Only downside are the high fees but I‚Äôm ok with that for the time being.

Message for the Developer: Since the latest software update, the ‚ÄúGet Coinbase Wallet‚Äù ad  keeps coming on every time I press anything. Whereas before the update it would only show itself on log in. I can still do what I need to do but need to keep closing the ad.
title: Easy to Use

review:
This apps a joke. Really difficult to use hidden fees everywhere. Then when you have finally had enough and want to get your money out you have to send them another ‚Äòsmall fee‚Äô to verify your account they won‚Äôt refund back on to a card. So naturally you send them a few pennies, but no they then in another part of the app tell you it has to be ¬£2, which you send here nothing... then you have to go back into the app and say you have sent it. They then say it will be 3 days to confirm your account. Then further log ins to actually withdraw your money. Weeks later still nothing ‚Äòverified‚Äô still no cash out. With fees at every corner and a poor app with hurdles throughout this company is a joke... my advice go elsewhere!

6 months now - sent them over ¬£50 to ‚Äòvalidate‚Äô my account. Still not done still no way of getting your money out. It‚Äôs a scam - beware.
title: A joke

review:
They have a very sketchy business structure for English customers. Depositing is fine, they charge you a fee, about 4%, to deposit using a debit card which is fine. But once you come to wanting to withdraw, that‚Äôs where it all becomes very dodgy. Apparently this, the largest bitcoin broker, only allows you to deposit to a verified bank account, which means you have to send a SEPA transfer to them to verify (which with Santander has a ¬£19 charge). They don‚Äôt offer PayPal or withdrawals using debit cards. So basically they‚Äôve very quick to take your money and charge you for the pleasure. But make it as hard and expensive as possible to get your money back.

Also, their customer service is awful, they don‚Äôt have a uk number to call so good luck incurring further costs trying to contact them, and their email support is terrible and takes forever to respond. 

If you do go through with the sepa transfer (cause hell, I‚Äôve got no other way to get my money back than spend more money), myself and loads of other are told that our transfer ‚Äúfailed‚Äù but they can verify it manually. Seems a little coincidental that so many payments fail but they‚Äôre still able to verify it manually.

Long story short, borderline fraudulent withdrawal process DO NOT USE
title: Borderline fraudulent

review: Been using coinbase for some time now and only had slight problems ie verifying bank details and for the most part it‚Äôs ok BUT if you want to trade you‚Äôve next to no chance as the charges take 80% of your profit so I bought ¬£50 of loopring they charged me 1.99 it went up 25% ish so I wanted to sell them but again after a drop this wouldn‚Äôt have meant a further ¬£3.98 making I pointless after the sale I‚Äôd have made ¬£1 ish. No I know this doesn‚Äôt seem a lot but If your wanting to buy sell quite often it‚Äôs take ages to make next to nothing, now I know some might say ¬£1.99 is nothing, but it goes up the more you want buy making it the same, the commission they‚Äôre taking is far too much it puts you out of the game.
title: Link back verification

review: I have been seeking help from Coinbase support team and have been unable to resolve my issue. I am not able to add payment - UK bank account. The initial payment keep bouncing back. I have raised this and keep getting the same response that my account has been reviewed and I should have full access without actually solving the issue. It is stated on Coinbase website that Coinbase supports faster payments method for UK customers. It also states that UK customers have access to both GBP and EUR wallet within the Coinbase account. After several weeks I am still unable to add payment - UK bank account and therefore unable to purchase any crypto. I am dissatisfied with the customer service as they have not been able to resolve my issue and I am considering closing my account. I do not have such issues with other exchanges, such as Binance.
title: UK bank account

review:
Some of the worst customer experience I have had in quite a long while. Account has been restricted with no reason given, and ID requested to be uploaded again. I had already done this and had it approved, but did what had been requested a month ago but account remains under review, and no answer is given ever when I ask why the account is under review- all that is received are bland customer service emails that give no information but passively aggressively suggest that if I dare to ask again as to why the account is restricted then my case goes to the bottom of the pile. Have now decided to close the account and received details quite quickly as to how to do this. So the company would rather lose a customer than provide any sense of customer service or answers to questions posed of them.

Avoid. Avoid. Avoid.
title: Avoid like the plague

review:
After providing all the required proof I did not hear anything back from them for a month and my account was still locked. Then after getting in touch with them, they told me ‚Äòdon‚Äôt worry, we‚Äôre looking into it‚Äô. Another month later and still nothing, got in contact again and they asked me to provide some extra information not previously asked for, and after providing that another few weeks has passed with nothing. I got in contact for a final time and was asked to stop contacting them regarding the matter as they‚Äôre working on it. Another couple of weeks later and still nothing.

Horrendous customer service and nearly 3 months and counting to get an account activated is unacceptable in my opinion - I will be taking my business elsewhere.
title: 3 months for account activation

review:
I really do not understand how this app works or operates. I‚Äôve had everything verified and the app tells me all I have to do is add funds. I try to add funds and I get a notification to say the account is still under review and to check back in a day or two! I‚Äôve been checking back for months and no change? 
I tried to raise a query and got a response saying somebody was looking into it, then a couple of days later another email to say they were closing my query! No resolution? review: They just charge you for every little thing, and don‚Äôt warn you that you need to verify your bank account by sending them an international transfer - normally this wouldn‚Äôt be a giant issue, but being from the UK, some banks charge up to ¬£25, just to send ‚Ç¨0.01... shambles. Genuinely, this app is simple for buying bitcoin, but useless for selling it. Do yourself a favour and use and online market, not an app like this - they just steal your money every time you try to do anything. I found t better to transfer my bitcoin to a different wallet that I have with another website and sell it on a bitcoin exchange because trying to withdraw directly to your bank account on this is so hopeless. Very slow transaction rate when transferring bitcoin to different wallets also, which is not good as the value can change so much in such a short time.
title: Don‚Äôt bother

review:
After having my funds emptied from my Coinbase account (Coinbase are still looking into this)  Coinbase support advised me on some further security options. They recommended A security key, providing a hyperlink link to the Yubikey. So I purchased two as advised. Then tried to register the keys only to find that The Coinbase App isn‚Äôt compatible with such keys so now have to use the web browser only. So don‚Äôt they trust their own App?

Note: Coinbase doesn‚Äôt offer 24/7 support and so simply are not likely to be there to help when your account is hacked. You can send them a message that they‚Äôll look at when back in the office. 

Support links can feel awkward, you can‚Äôt Just message them, and if your issue doesn‚Äôt quite fit their drop down options it‚Äôs really hard to make contact. 

Responses from their support team are sporadic and at times they just go quiet and don‚Äôt respond. 

(For info I have never had any other account hacked and subscribe to a range of monitoring organisations that still flag no issues with either email accounts or phone numbers being stolen, or misused. To date Coinbase remains unique in being an issue for me.)
title: Security issues with app

review:
Coinbase allowed me to trf money in and convert to Bitcoin when I set up my account, but won‚Äôt allow me to move or convert funds. The message is my account is under review (this is due to the signup verification process) This is still going on and it‚Äôs been 3 weeks. They have all that was requested. I contacted them once and followed up a few days later and was told not to contact them again as they are busy. For me, the money with them is making a loss as it‚Äôs in Bitcoin and I can‚Äôt convert it. 

I‚Äôve looked at other reviews and this seems to be a constant theme with Coinbase. Strangely the reviews are given 5 stars but if you read the reviews you can see this is not what the reviewer intended. So this is odd too.

Binance reviewed and verified my account in 2 days.
title: Joined 3 weeks ago and can‚Äôt access my money

review: I‚Äôm a complete novice and was drawn to Coinbase from what was probably an Instagram scam (a sam I managed to avoid falling into). But having done some research, I find that Coinbase itself is legit. It makes buy - and selling - of cryptocurrency very easy. I emphasise the selling because I‚Äôve seen a few reviewers say its‚Äôs not possible. Not true. Set up a PayPall account and selling your crypto is possible and again very easy. I‚Äôve got a lot to learn about crypto and I won‚Äôt be rushing in with large amounts of cash but the Coinbase route seems to be a pretty good way of getting started.
title: Excellent app

review: Coinbase app is beautifully laid out and so easy to use. What is particularly easy is to deposit money. Withdrawals, however, are IMPOSSIBLE. Please read other reviews in this issue since my experience is the same. Coinbase Support is useless. They do not return emails, do not update you of the progress and you are left completely at their mercy. I have been locked out of my account for months due to an issue that should have been solved within 10 working days. I have taken legal advice and will start proceedings with the UK FCA & Financial Ombudsman. Please read all reviews before deciding to trust this company with your money.
title: Stay away if you want to keep your money!

review: Considering the size of Coinbase and fees charged this app is mediocre at best. Just wanting to convert ¬£12 to BTC then send. It's not very slick, or particular user friendly. Screen size wrong on some screens and buttons hidden, instructions to add to wallet address incorrect, just bumbling from menu to menu hope to drop on right functions etc etc etc etc. Jesus spend some of those fees in making an exception product. It's only thing you have to get right...and you haven't. Others I know feel same, but they now quietly avoid Coinbase and don't bother feeding back. You loosing customers and you don't even know it. Other players are growing bigger, slicker and cheaper. mediocre may cut it when you are the big fish but those days are numbered, customers will leave in droves
title: Not very slick
developerResponse: {'id': 29264130, 'body': 'Hi Gee023, this isn‚Äôt the experience we want you to have and we thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We‚Äôll be sure to share this information with our teams to help us to improve in the future.', 'modified': '2022-04-19T15:00:00Z'}

review:
Once this app is running it‚Äôs fine. But my word if you have to ask the customer service team a question be prepared to be sent round in circles on their online faq website where you are basically told we ain‚Äôt got time for you so look it up yourself...needle in haystack. 
I waited 3 months for a reply to my question and it was a critical one to do with an issue about removing funds from the app. I had to ‚Äúget a ticket‚Äù in order to communicate with a human. No UK phone number and terrible email service. When they do reply to your email they give you a weak reply and then you go round again waiting for someone to reply again. 
so you are on your own here. Tread carefully. 
This is supposed to be the new age of commerce. But their customer service is in the dark ages.
title: Some good but pray you don‚Äôt need to speak to customer service

review: Been using this for around a fortnight after a friend introduced me to the wonderful world of Crypto, initially deposited ¬£500 and started trading then withdrew ¬£20 to test all was well, deposits are virtually instant (Barclays Bank Transfer) and free and the withdrawal stated it would take 2 days (2-3 days the norm. on most trading Apps) but was in my account (in full with no charges) the next day, I‚Äôm very happy with the App and have deposited over ¬£4k so far... go long on Chainlink! Next withdrawal will be in 5 years and extremely large (hopefully).
title: Excellent App, easy to use for a newbie to Crypto

review:
I have had to resort to giving coinbase a one star review on here in the hope that someone on the customer service team will reach out to me and Sort the problem out.
My account has been under review and I‚Äôve been unable to trade for nearly 4 months.
I‚Äôve tried contacting them directly but there is no way to just send a message. You have to go through multiple choice questions for any queries. None of of the multiple choice questions address the problem I have.
I have tried to pick the nearest response to my problem in the hope someone then reads the attached email but no!
I have been a customer since 2017 and have generally found them okay during this time. Why is it taking 4 months to manually review my account!!
title: Reviewing Account

review: Do not use Coinbase if you will ever need access to the money you deposit!! I made my account in January and was not able to make any transaction for a month while my account was being reviewed. I contacted support and another month past before they finally opened up my account to be able to buy and sell. Once I‚Äôd deposited money and invested in some cryptos, my account went under review again and has been that way ever since. I have been in contact with support who have claimed to have fixed the issue but have not, and have now said it will take up to 20 days before it gets looked at again. I have lots of money invested in cryptos on this platform that I have no access to because my account is ‚Äòunder review‚Äô.

review:
This app is so simple to use and is the only reason that I got into crypto currency. 

I agree with reviewers that there are some problems in the UK setting up a SEPA account however, after raising a ticket with support I had my account validated in two weeks and can now easily withdraw money. I think if you‚Äôre very clear in your message to support the faster it gets dealt with. 

The only small downside is that the app does slow down or crash when prices drop and everyone is selling. But Coinbase have been very transparent about the huge increase in customers and that they are trying to deal with it.

review:
I setup an account and it has been under review for 5 months‚Ä¶. (In the app it says it takes 2 to 3 days for the review to take place) I have submitted at least 9 tickets with the support team and all of them have been closed with nothing but a ‚Äúwe are working on this issue please don‚Äôt reply to this message‚Äù sort of response.

My girlfriend was able to set up an account and be accepted within 2 hours so I don‚Äôt understand where the issues are coming from but this company‚Äôs communication with customers is terrible.

Other than that it‚Äôs an amazing App it looks great it functions perfectly when looking at my girlfriends app but that is of no use to me if I can‚Äôt buy any crypto on a crypto purchasing platform.
title: Been waiting for account for 5 months

review: It has been several days I‚Äôm not being able to login to the Coinbase app; initially I thought it might be a server problem but now it doesn‚Äôt seem like that. It shows there is a connection issue, try again later. However, I am not being able to login in to the app despite trying over and over! Also tried cleaning app data, deleting and reinstalling, restarting the device, etc. It doesn‚Äôt feel good at all now! What‚Äôs wrong? And I am not sure what to do!

review:
I had a Coinbase account for the better part of 8-9 years. I had been using it to purchase cryptocurrency for so long then storing it on my ledger and it had worked to absolute perfection. 

My account was banned and I had no idea why as I feel I‚Äôd done nothing wrong? And if I did I would‚Äôve happily worked to reach a resolution as this was an extremely valuable account to me, upon emailing coinbase support I was told bluntly that any cases of being banned and account shutdown would not be given an elaboration on their decision because of security and blah blah blah.

I‚Äôve now stopped all of my trading with Coinbase, coinbase pro as well as their side app Coinbase Wallet and will never receive another dime from me, to treat your most committed and long term users like this is an absolute embarrassment.
title: Stopped using Coinbase

review: It was a little bit difficult understanding how the app, and more importantly the transfer of funds and purchasing worked, but now that I have carried out a couple of transactions I am really beginning to enjoy using Coinbase. The Helpdesk give very clear advise although there are times when they are heavily inundated (in which case you will receive a ping to let you know when an agent has replied). All my queries were answered, some quickly others no so but I got there in the end. A bit of a learning curve but fun all the same! Keep it up guys.

review: I was enjoying using this app and was finding it very easy to move money in to my account. When it came it to removing the money that‚Äôs when you find a problem. For a start they told me my card does not support withdrawals (which it does as confirmed by my bank.) secondly I decided to try and remove it through PayPal which currently has restrictions on it (not letting me send or receive money.) this was clearly my own fault however since then the money has vanished and is not sat with PayPal. I am now a considerable amount of money out of pocket and Coinbase are not responding. AVOID
title: Wouldn‚Äôt let me withdraw funds and then disappeared

review: Don‚Äôt understand what‚Äôs up with these bad reviews saying they can‚Äôt buy anything etc, I‚Äôve found Coinbase awesome , I‚Äôve been able to purchase coins , and send them to the Coinbase wallet, also tried selling a little amount to see if it went into my bank account and within seconds it was in my account , maybe it‚Äôs because of there banks ‚Ä¶ or maybe because there old reviews, but as of April 2022 I‚Äôve found Coinbase to be a great app no problems what so ever.

review:

I‚Äôm my opinion it‚Äôs a way of holding your funds for a greater time leading to more transactions and more fees. Extremely poor app and service. As soon as this final payment clears I am deleting. Utter garbage. It irritates me I have to give this 1 star to leave a review. As ever read the recent reviews first rather than the most helpful. title: Expensive and unresponsive

review: Once had high hopes for Coinbase but was let down badly vet quickly . 1700 Crypto tokens missing and they totally ignored all attempts to help me . Reported to financial ombudsman & financial service authority. Still waiting for Coinbase after 7 months! And many emails and tickets reported. There is no phone number to call and they have NO CUSTOMER SERVICE AT ALL. If something goes wrong your on your own with NO help . Be warned! Look on Twitter etc and look at all the people desperate for help .crooks!
title: Awful customer service.

review:
Pretty good but needs to have more available information such as price alerts which can be customised by the user, and the ability to preset trades at certain prices, both of which are unavailable. 
The main problem is that the customer service is awful. 
I‚Äôve contacted support three times using the drop-down menu options but have received no reply at all, meaning I am unable to verify my bank account in order to withdraw funds. 
The bank details Coinbase gives are not verifiable by my bank (Barclays) and so I currently can only put money in, but not take it back out again. 
Happy to change my review if this is resolved, but for now I would advise using a different app like Binance.
title: Pretty good

review:
Do not use this app it‚Äôs just an easy way for them to scam you out of your money, it starts off with you depositing your money, this is the only easy part of this process, because when you try to take the money out that‚Äôs where you will struggle. 

After reading other reviews it appears you will have to go through so much hassle to actually receive YOUR own money back! You will end up spending more money and more time just to get back the money which you should be able to get back instantly. Also I found it ridiculous that is fine to deposit from a normal bank card but if you want your money back well all off a sudden a bank won‚Äôt do!

Save yourself he stress, money and time and don‚Äôt wast your money on these scam artists
title: DO NOT USE THIS APP

review: It has a big problem were it says get crypto rewards for free, it won‚Äôt let you just says having problems connecting now not sure if it‚Äôs just me but what‚Äôs the point of having it there if it don‚Äôt work, side note Coinbase is good maked a few Thousand pounds from dec2020 to March2021 (today) don‚Äôt expect money to come for free or to make money over night u can‚Äôt just buy some and expect it to be worth more at all, u gotta know what your doing. Research and don‚Äôt listen to the people who just want you to buy into a coin to up the value for them because they hold so much of it.
title: Good I guess...

review:
App itself is intuitive to use and user friendly...HOWEVER when it comes to verifying your accounts and withdrawing money it‚Äôs a borderline scam. Security is tight which I appreciate but you have to verify with a valid photo ID which takes days to register and is nuts when dealing with a valid U.K. debit/credit card and bank accnt. 

Every transaction charges ‚Äòadmin‚Äô fees and before you can withdraw funds you have to make an international payment to Estonia in order to verify your bank account for which some U.K. banks charge additional fees (could end up being ¬£15 depending on your bank). This takes 3-4 days to process as does any withdrawal after this, so receiving any money back on your investments can potentially take weeks, hurdles you certainly don‚Äôt have to cross when depositing money in the first place. 

It‚Äôs only a matter of time before a better platform arrives that treats customers with respect, provides actual customer service and is transparent about transaction fees.

Until then, steer well clear of Coinbase!

Frankly I‚Äôm baffled that it has a 5* rating on the AppStore clearly there are some bots at work here.
title: Read the Smallprint!!!

review:
You will be lucky to come away from using this app just feeling disappointed and poverty. Most feel incensed and scammed. Check the Trustpilot reviews over what you see here.

Basically, there is a very high chance that you will be one of the hundreds of thousands of random users that will be locked out of your account because of a review that never finishes or because they‚Äôve lost all your funds and don‚Äôt want to bother telling you.

There is no actual support or contact for them when this does happen. None whatsoever. There is a place you can send an email to, but you will not get a reply. There is a complaints page that leads to the same email, but you will not get a reply. There used to be a phone number you could call, but they successfully got rid of that years ago. There are thousands of Reddit posts ready for you to read that will tell you the same thing. 

If I could give -5 stars, it would still be too much. The most abhorrent and reprehensible company I have ever known. Stay away at all costs.
title: An absolute trainwreck. Avoid like face herpes.

review:
Ok so the platform is easy to use, has an excellent UI and I‚Äôve had no issues with verification or limits. It doesn‚Äôt have order books or advanced chart features, but is aimed at retail investors as opposed to sophisticated.

The problem I have with Coinbase are the hidden fees. Buying ETH today priced at ~1690, once the spread, liquidity, the buy fee and the debit card fee are taken into account I paid ~1780. Also worth noting that the majority of the cost comes from the debit card fee, and in the UK this is currently the only way to buy on Coinbase.

Even if you‚Äôre planning to hold longterm this platform simply isn‚Äôt worth it. More transparency re the true cost of purchase is required and I‚Äôll be, migrating to Binance and complaining to the FCA.
title: High Fees

review:
Really user friendly app. Just two minor points which drops it to 4 stars. 
Firstly the fees are higher than other crypto apps. That‚Äôs acceptable as I find Binance etc much more difficult to navigate so I‚Äôll stay with Coinbase for now. The second negative is the layout change recently. There used to be all the latest crypto news if you scrolled down the main page. Now that‚Äôs changed to info on various tokens that they‚Äôre trying to flog you. Change the page back again please!!!

review: This is the worst way to buy and sell BTC if you have a uk bank account. The process to add money to your account is nice and easy (quelle surprise) however, when you try to withdraw your funds, the process becomes ridiculously complicated, and you are penalised with so many charges that any profit made on your coins becomes lost during the transfer. You cannot transfer directly to a U.K. Bank account, it has to be done via a sepa transfer in euros which is a nightmare. I'd never recommend this app to anyone, ever. I have approximately ¬£400 stuck there!! Unbelievable. Furthermore, when you try to contact Coinbase for assistance their method is either a bot system, or an email that you never receive a response to. Avoid this app at all costs.

They finally have agreed to give me my original funds back with no explanation as to why this happened.  Unfortunately after they have agreed to refunding the funds they have locked me out of my account and have started the entire conversation from scratch, so daft is understatement. review:

So today (feb 7th) I awoke to an updated Coinbase app. Eager to check on ‚Äúmy precious‚Äù I dove right on in there... wait a minute... argh!... what‚Äôs this... ... üòßü§î

I understand that during the pandemic restrictions some may be forced to work from home, and that sometimes may include child care. This doesn‚Äôt necessarily mean you should let your kids have a go at redesigning the UX whilst you squash any bugs brought to your attention. üòâ
Overall, as a UK user, I have not experienced any problems purely specific to ‚ÄòCoinbase‚Äô.
Yes there has been exchange issues sporadically, however these can be encountered on any exchange, especially during busy periods.

Keep up the good work guys/girls üëçüèªüëçüèª but seriously, sort out that UX.

title: Coinbase

review:
I don‚Äôt understand coinbase‚Ä¶ they want to be taken seriously.. but their customer support is shocking

If you want support you go to their support site - there are links everywhere to ‚Äúcontact us‚Äù but they just take you to the support home page. There is a menu to get in touch but each click limits you to specific options and there is no way to send an enquiry on something that isn‚Äôt on their very limited list

So you get past that barrier and manage to send them an email. All you get are automated responses of generic text. I am on my 5th reply and yet to get anything specific to me and just get boilerplate 

There are plenty of other places to buy crypto (with often much less fees)‚Ä¶ I‚Äôd pay coinbases fees if I thought I was getting decent support but it‚Äôs the opposite 

Coinbase will go downhill and there‚Äôll be all sorts of introspection as to what happened to the market etc. But basic customer service isn‚Äôt rocket science yet is completely lacking and I am taking my business elsewhere

review:

As a workaround, I set up a Revolut a/c within 5 mins. Loaded that account from nationwide; paid coinbase and within two days had received payment of my coinbase assets into my Revolut euro account which I can now convert into GBP at the best FX rate and without added fees. I won‚Äôt use coinbase again since they control the market & make extraction from their wallets difficult.

review: Signed up a month ago, sent in passport pic etc... it said will review in 2-3 days... 30 days later and counting and they still have not verified my account. I‚Äôve emailed twice and they basically say they are busy and me emailing them makes them busier. In that time Bitcoin went up 33% by ¬£10,000, then dropped again. I feel I have lost out on thousands in gains as I was unable to conduct the main purpose of joining. USE BINANCE INSTEAD. I WAS TRADING WITHIN 5 MINUTES INCLUDING PASSPORT VERIFICATION CHECKS. Whatever the situation is at CB, it is a shambolic service with no justification for how poor a service they offer. Even after emailing them weeks ago they haven‚Äôt got around to checking verification documents. TERRIBLE TERRIBLE AVOID.
title: TERRIBLE TERRIBLE AVOID

review: This is an honest review. Coinbase is GREAT when it wants to work but be aware, it has the tendency to go against you for no apparent reason. I‚Äôve had a CB account for a few years now and it‚Äôs only recently I decided to start using it again, everything was fine I was able to deposit and make trades until I tried to deposit and all of a sudden an error message comes up saying i haven‚Äôt got a method set up with my account so I can‚Äôt deposit??? Nothing had changed, my details had been set up and like I said I was able to deposit so what on earth is going on now? Really disappointed with CB by this, things like this will easily lose you customers.
title: Not as good as it seems

review:
I sent ¬£2 deposit to verify my bank account, but it keeps showing that my account is not verified, now it's been 2 month since I registered, I reported more than 3 times with my bank transfer record and 1 pound return record, now they even removed my bank account details from my account.

However, I have not received notification of the progress of the process, but I continue to receive the satisfaction survey, then after a few days, my report was marked as closed. It seems that they only care about the quality of customer service staff and have no intention of dealing with the real problem.

A company that makes me feel very sad.
title: Very irresponsible service

review:
The feature to add a UK bank account doesn‚Äôt work so withdrawing funds isn‚Äôt possible unless you have a PayPal account. Adding funds is also not possible unless you use a credit or debit card both being a major inconvenience and an impossibility to those who do not have either of these. 

Also once you sign out from the app. It is impossible to sign back in again and you have to go through the web. 

Both issues have been raised with Coinbase via the help and messaging section but remain unresolved.
title: Issues withdrawing money and signing in

review:
I created an account and was after carrying out the necessary verifications I was was able to trade crypto freely. For no apparent reason I was suddenly blocked from buying or selling any form of crypto as my, ‚ÄòAccount is being reviewed‚Äô. 

They state that this review takes 2-3 days but I have now been waiting just over three months and have no idea how to get my money back.

I have submitted 4 separate cases to them using their help centre (the only way to contact them) but each time my cases is, ‚Äòresolved and closed‚Äô‚Ä¶. My case is not resolved!!

They have no call centres‚Ä¶they don‚Äôt have a useful help centre online. So I finally tried to reach out on Twitter in the hopes that‚Äôs their social media department could point me in the right direction. To no avail. It‚Äôs been 2 weeks and they still haven‚Äôt replied to it.

Reading other reviews I am not the only person to be treated like this. My only recommendation is that you do not put your money into this company under any circumstances!!
title: Avoid!

review: Coinbase app is easy to use for monitoring your account and the current prices. Personally I prefer to use the website to carry out transactions but maybe I'm over cautious. One criticism I would make is the the app remains logged into your account and does not time out. You must explicitly log out and the button to do that is right at the end of the settings menu. Automatic time out would be better.
title: Easy access to your Coinbase account.

review: Coinbase takes a fee to verify your bank details. This worked without issue and our purchase should go through within a few days, according to their disclaimer. A MONTH later and nothing. We know all the information is correct. Can‚Äôt get through on the phones. Non-existent customer service. If this hadn‚Äôt of been a recommendation I would have thought this was a scam. Must be a better platform out there.
title: Not one for new customers

review: If you are lucky enough to not have any problem then you will probably like Coinbase but as there system is always service outage most of the people are unlucky like me I had problem in linking my Bank account I contacted customer service got reply after one month say ‚Äúif the problem is resolved ignore this message‚Äù but problem was still same it‚Äôs been over two months now no one give a dame.... if I call customer service they rude people say we can not help you with that you have to email us which I did over two months ago. Shame on you Coinbase if you can‚Äôt handle such a work load just close the company. I am done with you.
title: Bad service not recommend

Coinbase was quite good at resolving the issue despite taking slightly longer to do so. Great app overall üëçüèº

review:
My main grumble is that they don't do enough at coinbase to help people cash out. Functionality on this is very underdeveloped and blog posts on this are frightening for first time investors. On the plus side they are one of the most established and well backed.
Would be great if it could total your investment for each coin so you would know how much profit you have made overall without having to add up your fiat money investment manually. Would be great if you could short trade too when market dips but that's next  level I suppose.
title: Great introducing app but a few irritations

review:
Great, easy to use, and very well laid out. Of recent time in the last 3 to 4 weeks I‚Äôve had no notifications at all, even though they are on in the app and on in my notification centre. 

I‚Äôve messaged about this a few times with a little improvement. Are used to get notifications every day when my investments would go 5 5% higher or lower, this has now unfortunately stopped. 

Can this please be repaired immediately?
title: Great app but notifications have stopped

review:
Firstly the layout and app looks good,
However, my first account never got past verification stage despite numerous support cases emails being created submitted and ‚Äúclosed as completed‚Äù.  

After weeks of frustration I closed this account and tried remaking another in case there was a background issue. My second attempt at making an account got through the verification stage for 5 minutes but then continuously got put ‚Äòon‚Äô and taken ‚Äòoff‚Äô ‚Äúbeing reviewed‚Äù and so I continuously had limited access. It‚Äôs now been ‚Äúunder review‚Äù for 3 weeks (should be and have been told by their standard text ‚Äúa few days‚Äù). 

The customer support was useless at helping me and my case submissions never progressed to anything, instead they sent me the same copy and paste layout emails and said they have no update to give on my account. 

Would recommend using another app to start learning and investing.
title: Verification process and Customer Support are extremely poor

review: So... would love to actually try the app out, but my account has been under review for over a month now and despite being told it was expedited nothing has changed. It doesn‚Äôt seem anything is missing but it‚Äôs not clear. So essentially I want to use Coinbase but can‚Äôt because it seems the review will never happen. No problem to have your own review processes, but if you don‚Äôt have capacity for the processes you have in place (as you say you‚Äôve got a lot of people signing up), you probably want to change something. I‚Äôm off to find another app that will let me actually trade.
title: The endless account reviews

review:
The app is limited as when buying and selling you don‚Äôt have complete clarity on prices. For example crypto‚Äôs are quoted in $, but on Coinbase they quote in your native currency, so you have no idea what price you are actually paying - and yet after the purchase the valuation is in $.
Also you have no ability to set orders to buy or sell at a particular price. 
Finally I have beef asked to submit an updated ID - which I did and it has taken days without any response. In the meantime I cannot purchase any coins. There is no proper support function - just FAQ which is useless. I compare this to other sites where I have submitted my ID and it‚Äôs been approved in seconds.
title: Very Frustrating

review: Getting verified is beyond frustrating. Passport? Nope. Drivers license? Nope. It‚Äôs as if it doesn‚Äôt even look at the images supplied, regardless of the level of quality. I made the images crystal clear and even photoshop‚Äôd them to make them absolutely perfect, and it makes zero difference. Contact customer support and it‚Äôs none existent. No live chat, no email address, very very hard to get through on the phone and if you send a form you get a useless automated email saying you should look at the help documents. Cannot believe this is a publicly traded company now with such an appalling customer support system.
title: Customer support is utter garbage

review: This is the second time when the bitcoin was in a good state to make profit and the app blocked my account for some reason just to stop me from selling and get my profit. I cant imagine how they did this to me on 2017 and cost me a loss of ¬£20k just because when i decided to sell they just blocked my account. No customer service was even able like now and they only helped when they found out about my Twit on Twitter with complain and negative feedback. Be really careful with choosing this app to work with. At the time of making profit they will somehow block your account or will ask stupid verification which you have done years before.
title: Unbelievably disgusting and dodgy

review:
So I setup a coin base account. Jumped through all the hoops to verify account etc! Setup PayPal and started trading. Got over 1k in trades and I‚Äôm up. Want to close them trades now, can‚Äôt! Why? Because coin base are scamming bast@&ds! Won‚Äôt let me close trades to my wallet and won‚Äôt let me withdraw with PayPal. Just come with the same message ‚ÄúPayPal linked to another account‚Äù which is just utter nonsense! Tried contacting coin base support multiple times and get nothing back other than, ‚Äúyour case has been closed‚Äù no help, no one to actually talk to or get help from! Over ¬£1k on my screen I can‚Äôt do nothing with! 
WHEN I SAY AVOID LIKE THE PLAGUE! This ain‚Äôt no joke!
title: Avoid avoid avoid

I‚Äôve only ever used CB but beginning to think I‚Äôll transfer elsewhere. 
I never ever write reviews but something has been broken at CB that worked perfectly before. It was also changed without me downloading the new upgrade!!
title: Change layout of coinbase and the wallet

review: withdrew money from another wallet to place in my coinbase wallet and the funds went missing. the transaction said completed but the funds did not appear.
