I know the details I entered were correct but I kept receiving the same automated message. I will never be using them again and advice you AVOID this app, as if something goes wrong there is no customer service to help.
title: Customer service is -10/10

review:
I don't know what all the bad reviews are about!

I deposited ¬£100 via Debit Card, the %charge was a bit high but it worked fine. Bought some Eth/Btc no problem. Went to sell and withdraw and it required me to set up and verify a bank account via SEPA. So I did this with a ‚Ç¨6 transfer, 2 days later, done! 

I can now transfer money back and forth (free/‚Ç¨0.15 charge) into my coinbase wallet with a delay of about 2 days.

I have made multiple withdrawals to my bank since, no problem.

I haven't had a error due to too many people investing when the price drops like other people have said, maybe I've just been lucky!

My UK bank is Barclays, they have no SEPA charges when done online or via the mobile app. 

Live prices would be a great improvement!
title: Works perfect! Charges are a bit high but can be avoided

review:
This is literally the worst app ever. How can a financial app not have any means of communication.

They have held my money for weeks and ive tried tweeting them, I‚Äôve tried DM‚Äôing them on insta, I‚Äôve tried going through their official means of submitting a help request! Everything and no response! The app has my money and won‚Äôt let me purchase crypto! So I thought we‚Äôll let me withdraw my money... won‚Äôt let me withdraw my money. 

So I thought alright I‚Äôll just wait a few weeks delete the app and re add.. still no change! In fact now the money that was sitting in my wallet (not invested yet) had disappeared! I‚Äôm soo upset frustrated and just arghhh!! I‚Äôm going to have to request the money from my bank providers which is super frustrating because I genuinely wanted to keep investing ! The worst part is all my money that was invested has suffered major lost because I can‚Äôt even sell the crypto!!!!! 

Don‚Äôt put yourselves through this.
title: WORST PLACE TO BUY CRYPTO.. NO MEANS OF COMMUNICATION

review: A very cleverly created application that appears to be a crypto currency exchange. However upon further investigation I have found that none of their options for adding bank accounts and PayPal deposits safely are available. Instead they advertise withdrawal methods that when attempted will inevitably fail. You cannot link your PayPal to withdraw funds, or link your bank account to withdraw. You can however deposit money via debit or credit card that you will never see again. Be aware this application is a fraudulent scam and needs closing immediately and investigating by the financial ombudsmen.
title: Sinister business model

review: There seems to be an error In the last iOS updates 9.23.2 and 9.24.3 the portfolio is showing an incorrect figure, (not even close). I can‚Äôt recommend Coinbase as a platform as it took over two months for customer service to eventually get back to me when trying to open account, seems to be normal judging from other reviews. Update 9.25.4 fixed issue above (not customer support) but can no longer see portfolio percentage change.
title: IOS ver 9.23.2 & 9.24.3 portfolio incorrect figures

review:
Just a piece of advice for everyone!
1. If you sending money from a non supported financial institution, in theory the money will be rejected and refunded. As I didn‚Äôt know that my financial institution is not supported, I sent the money. Over 1 month later, still no money! I mean it is not returned and not credited! Disappeared!
2. Customer service non existent! I created four cases regarding the issue with the deposit. They delete the case without replying. I mean they make the case disappear from my account!
3. When the market suddenly fluctuate they block transactions. You can‚Äôt sell and buy, therefore missing out on opportunities to make money. 
4. I spoke with people who actually managed to register their bank account, yet the withdrawal process is long (weeks) and painful!
Therefore I regret trying my luck with this company. If you reading this review, make sure you consider this before investing any money & keep in mind if something looks too good be true, probably is!
title: Not trustworthy!

review:
They watch your activity , make false accusations about your activity. crap support . With hold your data when you request a subject access request. Breach ICO and GDPR regulations .extortionate fee charges Avoid this company at all costs

Good place to start as a novice and gives you a sense of security with setting up an account and it‚Äôs wallet.

You can also earn from tutorials and investing into coins which give you rewards for coins.

review:

I followed the instructions to change country, uploaded again and my country changed to senagal. I checked my ip, showed correctly as Manchester England, uploaded again and still Senegal. review:
Everything initially seemed fine - deposited money, purchased bitcoin, linked account. However, when I tried to withdraw my money - nothing. It has left my Coinbase account and disappeared into the ether, never having been received to my linked and verified account (for which you have to jump through hoops to do...) 
There is no way to contact them other than by email, and no-one responds to the emails that I have sent. The withdrawal confirmation on December 30 said that I would have it in my account by January 2nd. It is the 7th and still nothing. I would strongly warn people against using this service

Edit: it is now January 12 with still no sign of my money, and no response from customer support other than an auto-mailer that basically says ‚Äúwe‚Äôre too busy to get to your email right now‚Äù üôÑ

Edit 2: My money finally arrived on Jan 16, 2 weeks (and multiple inadequately answered complaint emails) after the promised arrival date

It‚Äôs crashing when people are wanting to buy product, so it will definitely crash when everyone wants to run for the door, meaning people won‚Äôt be able to get their money out during a sell-off. It takes nearly ¬£60 to get money out and even at that mine still isn‚Äôt verified.

They have no customer support, their uk base is an empty building, no phone number, no one to contact, just a pile of hassle and stress. 

Never ever use this app! Complete scam! Unable to withdraw funds! Basically taken my money and kept it! Wasted ¬£80 trying to sort. Eventually had to buy coins with my remaining money and send/ sell to a friend to get rid of it!

Do not fall into the trap! Research Coinbase problems on google first! Learn from my mistake!

As others have said, prepare for your account to be ‚Äòin review‚Äô for weeks, if not months. But only after you‚Äôve deposited money with them. 

I opened my account in 2018, got my ID verified quickly and bought my first asset earlier this year. Once I‚Äôd bought it, my account was placed in review and that‚Äôs where it‚Äôs stayed, more than two months later. My ID was successfully verified back in 2018, but even if another verification was necessary, it shouldn‚Äôt take two months. I‚Äôm missing out on so many opportunities because I can‚Äôt buy new assets or sell the one I have.

Support is a joke. You‚Äôll get an automated response that they‚Äôre ‚Äúreally busy‚Äù but will hear little else. 

I‚Äôm just waiting til my account is unlocked and then I‚Äôll be closing my Coinbase account.

Avoid.
title: Account in review forever

review: I had funds stuck on Coinbase wallet for over 2 months with transactions stuck on pending. I reached out to Coinbase well over 50 times and was ignored by their disgraceful customer service. There is actually no way of contacting Coinbase wallet as all emails end up in a void and there is no contact number to call. I eventually had to email Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong I‚Äôm order to get my issue resolved. Besides this, fees are incredibly high and there are much better options available. Avoid Coinbase where ever possible
title: Awful company

review: Once you have set up your deposit bank account it‚Äôs a doddle to sell or buy. I really think people need to invest time into using this app and learn to drive. To sell is easy: 1. Sell into your GBP or Euro wallet on your coin base account 2. Transfer dosh to your account! Simples.

review: Recently opened an account.  You have to follow an elaborate process to link a bank account and send them some money to confirm your account.  My credit never appeared in my account and they asked for increased amounts of personal data from an initial proof of the transaction to a full months bank statement!? Still no credit or refund to date.  If a financial app cant get linking a bank account right I wouldn‚Äôt trust them with your money.  DON‚ÄôT SEND THEM ANYTHING!!

review:
App needs work, to be responsive to device screen sizes, when stated as supported device.
Currently, display viewport is for mobile on a tablet, consequently, you only get about one third the size of available screen.

Suggest: flexbox, media queries, grid and more available technologies, which are all current, stable and secure options for making this app work on a tablet, with a more visible and interactive UI - currently a poor UX on tablet.

title: Not bad but needs improvements!

review:
A very slick app. Easy to use and buy currency. Great at tracking your profit/loss.
As the most popular exchange it is prone to the occasional crash when the Bitcoin world has a frenzy(the $10k moment for example). Recommending app if you understand that...
YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO DIRECTLY WITHDRAW FUNDS TO A U.K. BANK 

The app asks you to deposit funds via a sepa transfer(¬£10 charge from your bank to do this) so it can then verify your account. Like countless others I tried this but no joy. Don't do this!

To withdraw you'll need to log on to coinbase via a p.c , and send your coin the address of another wallet/exchange account you have setup(I used bitpanda who charged ¬£1 for the privilege) . Make sure it's one that has sepa transfers properly setup- test first !
